name: The Metaverse
description:
THERE IS A BUG WITH THE WEB BUILD ABOUT THE WIREFRAME SHADER. PLEASE TRY THE WINDOWS BUILD INSTEAD!

(I'll post a youtube devlog video showing the entire game if you want to rate without downloading the game)

This is "The Metaverse", my entry for the Casual Jam 2 made in 5 hours with Unity.

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D - Arrow Keys : Move Player

You have to avoid.. well basically everything. How far can you go?
